item.title: Disruption Element 7
item.description: Quantum Engineering Education As quantum technologies transition from research labs to commercial applications, a significant skill gap is emerging. The Quantum Economic Development Consortium estimates that the quantum industry will require over 100,000 skilled workers by 2030, yet fewer than 5,000 graduates annually have relevant training (QED-C, 2023).
